full_text: AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT State of California County of Los Angeles } SS I , Jose de Jesus Quintana Diaz , residing at 1122 Kern Avenue, Los Angeles, California 90022. BEING FIRST DULY SWORN, DEPOSE AND SAY That I am a citizen of Mexico born at Tepe- huanes, Durango, Mexico, on February 6, 1945. Single. That I am 27 years of age and have resided in the United States since I was admitted at the Port of San Ysidro, California, on September 28, 1967. My Alien Registration Receipt Card No. FOIA (b)(6) THAT it is my intention and desire to have the following person(s) at present residing at Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico come to the United States: AS PERMANENT RESIDENTS: Country Relationship NAME Sex Age of Birth to deponent JUAN QUINTANA SANCHEZ.- Male.- 59 Yrs.- Mexico.- Father BALTAZAR DIAZ DE QUINTANA.- - Female.- 57 Yrs. - Mexico. - Mother.- FOIA (b)(6) THAT I am employed oxxengegedxin the business of General Assist. with California Soaz Company Inc. ,at Los Angeles, California and derive a net annual Income of $ 7,400.00 approximately, at the rate of $142.80 per week. THAT I have deposits in Banks in this country $ 100.00 . THAT I own Real Estate at place of residence valued at $ 20,000.00 with mortgages or other encumbrances amounting $ 10,000.00 . THAT I have other personal property with a reasonable value of $ 5,000.00 with encumbrances amounting $ none . THAT I have Life Insurance in the sum of $ 30,000.00 with cash surrender value of $ none .
